message:
Bangladesh: UK rescue aid rejected after Dhaka factory collapse

Bangladesh rejected offers of search and rescue teams from Britain and other countries to free people trapped during last week's catastrophic factory collapse in Dhaka, The Daily Telegraph has learned.

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/asia/bangladesh/10024004/Bangladesh-UK-rescue-aid-rejected-after-Dhaka-factory-collapse.html?fb
